rocktogun_green.name: Green Rocktogun
rocktogun_green.desc: A seed dispersal mechanism, though the seeds are unripe.

rocktogun_beige.name: Beige Rocktogun
rocktogun_beige.desc: What is it doing, throwing seeds when they're not even ready?

tentacles_blooming.name: Blooming Tentacles
tentacles_blooming.desc: Covered in potent flowers that can even make shields sneeze!

rocktogun_yellow.name: Yellow Rocktogun
rocktogun_yellow.desc: The seeds are hardening, though not ready.

tentacles_sour.name: Sour Tentacles
tentacles_sour.desc: The sourness should make it unpalatable, but doesn't.

rocktogun_orange.name: Orange Rocktogun
rocktogun_orange.desc: Finally, the seeds are done and the biology of this creature makes sense!

tentacles_ripe.name: Ripe Tentacles
tentacles_ripe.desc: Covered in delicious fruit that you'll have to fight for.

rocktogun_red.name: Red Rocktogun
rocktogun_red.desc: The spiciness doesn't really come out before the hard shell is damaged.

rocktogun_purple.name: Purple Rocktogun
rocktogun_purple.desc: Although spoiled, the fruits keep growing.

tentacles_spoiled.name: Spoiled Tentacles
tentacles_spoiled.desc: As time goes on, the color gets more menacing.

tentacles_putrid.name: Putrid Tentacles
tentacles_putrid.desc: When a rocktopus nears its death, it tries to take everyone also with it.
